mapper.insert: insert into t_apply_cashout (id, open_id, cashout_type, card_name, card_no, card_type, weixin_no, zhifubao_name, zhifubao_no, money, status, remark, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashoutType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weixinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhifubaoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zhifubaoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_apply_cashout set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cashout_type = #{cashoutType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, card_name = #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_no = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_type = #{cardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixin_no = #{weixinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhifubao_name = #{zhifubaoName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zhifubao_no = #{zhifubaoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, open_id, cashout_type, card_name, card_no, card_type, weixin_no, zhifubao_name, zhifubao_no, money, status, remark, create_date, update_date from t_apply_cashout where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, open_id, cashout_type, card_name, card_no, card_type, weixin_no, zhifubao_name, zhifubao_no, money, status, remark, create_date, update_date from t_apply_cashout
select count(1) from t_apply_cashout where status=0
